<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a89a44a4d396c790185f90246d3c83532">SmallVectorImpl&lt;T&gt;::const&#95;pointer</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2e3d3da964f7eb14ef2eabf0c4a08ba5"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a2e3d3da964f7eb14ef2eabf0c4a08ba5">c&#95;str</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;T&gt;</a> &amp;str) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#ad97688dfe9cd802e2a0691cbe620218a">pop&#95;back</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> str.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a7b68be12c974b6b70bc86062f221a344">data</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">sys &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1a420333641cfdaa22a032c78e92aa55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::chrono::nanoseconds <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1a420333641cfdaa22a032c78e92aa55">toDuration</a>(FILETIME Time) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ULARGE&#95;INTEGER TimeInteger;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TimeInteger.LowPart = Time.dwLowDateTime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TimeInteger.HighPart = Time.dwHighDateTime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FILETIME&#39;s are # of 100 nanosecond ticks (1/10th of a microsecond)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::chrono::nanoseconds(100 &#42; TimeInteger.QuadPart);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a84a00c87271f14ecf54ba237642f6174"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a52f2c3fdd7f80c1991d8c7079489efff">TimePoint&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a7e0c6b3661b9c9f048aaef620463f1bc">toTimePoint</a>(FILETIME Time) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ULARGE&#95;INTEGER TimeInteger;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TimeInteger.LowPart = Time.dwLowDateTime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TimeInteger.HighPart = Time.dwHighDateTime;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust for different epoch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TimeInteger.QuadPart -= 11644473600ll &#42; 10000000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FILETIME&#39;s are # of 100 nanosecond ticks (1/10th of a microsecond)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a52f2c3fdd7f80c1991d8c7079489efff">TimePoint&lt;&gt;</a>(std::chrono::nanoseconds(100 &#42; TimeInteger.QuadPart));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a3923e2871fd70f698ac2ea4317346593"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FILETIME <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a3923e2871fd70f698ac2ea4317346593">toFILETIME</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a52f2c3fdd7f80c1991d8c7079489efff">TimePoint&lt;&gt;</a> TP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ULARGE&#95;INTEGER TimeInteger;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TimeInteger.QuadPart = TP.time&#95;since&#95;epoch().count() / 100;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  TimeInteger.QuadPart += 11644473600ll &#42; 10000000;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FILETIME Time;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Time.dwLowDateTime = TimeInteger.LowPart;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Time.dwHighDateTime = TimeInteger.HighPart;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Time;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/windows"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/windows">windows</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns command line arguments. Unlike arguments given to main(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this function guarantees that the returned arguments are encoded in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// UTF-8 regardless of the current code page setting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/windows/#a4bf9f1ed9330c6ba76802ed4c06750fd"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::error&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/windows/#a4bf9f1ed9330c6ba76802ed4c06750fd">GetCommandLineArguments</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;const char &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;Args,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Convert UTF-8 path to a suitable UTF-16 path for use with the Win32 Unicode</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxPathLen = MAX&#95;PATH);</span></CodeLine>
